Here is a bullet list of required concrete visual elements for the final image:

*   Clean, transparent glass cup
*   Cup positioned slightly left of center, at the bottom of the frame
*   Realistic glass material of the cup
*   Clear water filling the cup
*   Subtle highlights on the cup's rim
*   Outdoor pool (in the background scene)
*   Several young people (in the background scene)
*   People in swimwear
*   Chatting people (or groups of people chatting)
*   Diving person or people (or person in diving motion)
*   People leaning by the poolside
*   Colorful balloons (surrounding the pool)
*   Pool-type umbrellas (around the pool)
*   Folding chairs (around the pool)
